page.title: 11THE GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: These are some of the games we play when we play out. KICKY THE CAN:First we have to find a can.Then everybody gets 20 off.Whoever is on catches the others and they hide round the garages.They stand over the can until sombody kicks it. POLO:Whoever is on picks a subject like cars and shouts out names like Rover or Princess.The person who has whispered that name has to run back and forth. AUNTIES & UNCLES:Three or four play,one says "Aunty Mary"if you have an Aunty Mary you take one step,if you have three you take three steps! FOX & HOUNDS:To play you need a bike and some chalk,then you make arrows all over the paths.People have to follow the arrows.
